trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection"></xref> objects in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor do componente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection"> </xref> objetos associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> elements of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> objects in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control at design time, under the control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: A classe de MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor fornece uma interface de utilizador para editar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>elementos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>objetos associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controlo no momento da conceção, sob o controlo do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: There is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> associated with each of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: Não existe um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>associados a cada um do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> objects are used to apply styles to menu items that depend on their level (nesting depth) in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: Estes <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>objectos são utilizados para aplicar estilos para itens de menu que dependem do respetivo nível (a profundidade de aninhamento) na estrutura de menu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor is invoked, for example, by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelMenuItemStyles** or **LevelSelectedStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor é invocado, por exemplo, selecionando o botão de reticências (**... **) no **LevelMenuItemStyles** ou **LevelSelectedStyles** linha no **propriedades** grelha do visual designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>método devolve sempre `false` para indicar que apenas um objeto pode ser selecionado um momento no editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> method creates a new form to display and edit the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>método cria um novo formulário para apresentar e editar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> atual</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>método cria uma nova instância do tipo de item de coleção especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> method returns an array of types that the editor can create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>método devolve uma matriz de tipos que pode criar o editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> class when you select, for example, the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **LevelMenuItemStyles** or **LevelSelectedStyles** row in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control or a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework constrói internamente uma nova instância da classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>Quando seleciona, por exemplo, o botão de reticências (**... **) no **LevelMenuItemStyles** ou **LevelSelectedStyles** linha no **propriedades** grelha do designer visual ao conceber um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controlo ou um controlo que deriva da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the collection to edit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>Coleção para editar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether multiple <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> elements can be selected in the editor at one time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se vários <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref> elementos podem ser selecionados no editor de cada vez.

trans-unit.source: The CanSelectMultipleInstances method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> object.
trans-unit.target: O método de CanSelectMultipleInstances sempre devolve `false`; assim, apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>objeto pode ser selecionado um dado momento a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new form to display and edit the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo formulário para apresentar e editar atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The CreateCollectionForm method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A> base method to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> form, and then formats a caption for the form.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método CreateCollectionForm o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>base método para criar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>formam e, em seguida, formata uma legenda para o formulário.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CreateCollectionForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm> to use as the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm>para utilizar como o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor"> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do tipo de item de coleção especificada.

trans-unit.source: The CreateInstance method is used to create new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: O método de CreateInstance é utilizado para criar um novo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The CreateInstance calls the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method to access the activation methods for late-bound support.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de CreateInstance o <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>método para aceder aos métodos de ativação para o suporte de vinculação tardia.</xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of item to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do item para criar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified type, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do tipo especificado, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data types that this collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os tipos de dados que pode criar este editor de coleções.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor> object can create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> type objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>pode criar o objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>objetos do tipo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A type array of the data types the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor"></xref> can create.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipo dos tipos de dados a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollectionEditor"> </xref> pode criar.
